channel.title: 3 - Programming in Python on Intro to Computer-Science Berlin
channel.description: Recent content in 3 - Programming in Python on Intro to Computer-Science Berlin

item.title: 24/March - Introduction to Python
item.description: Pre Requisites None for today! Class Curriculum Section content Expected time (mins) Pre - Requirements Check-in and questions from last class 5 minutes ❌ Lesson Goals 5 minutes ❌ Python Overview 15 minutes ❌ Hands-on Python exercise (in pairs) 45-60 minutes ❌ Break 10 minutes ❌ Synthesis of Python Concepts from Exercise 15-30 minutes ❌ (Possible) "Hello World" in Python Exercise 20 minutes ❌ Check-out 5 minutes ❌ Lesson Goal Have a high-level idea of what Python is and start getting comfortable reading and writing basic statements in this programming language.
